description_translations.en: Identify and engage the relevant stakeholders. Gather initial preferences and assign roles to each participant to ensure the process is well-coordinated from the beginning.
description_translations.es: Identificar e involucrar a las partes interesadas relevantes. Recopilar las preferencias iniciales y asignar roles a cada participante para asegurar una coordinación adecuada desde el principio.
description_translations.it: Identifica e coinvolgi i partecipanti rilevanti. Raccogli le preferenze iniziali e assegna ruoli a ciascun partecipante per garantire un coordinamento efficace sin dall'inizio.
description_translations.lv: Identificējiet un iesaistiet atbilstošās ieinteresētās puses. Savāciet sākotnējās preferences un piešķiriet lomas katram dalībniekam, lai nodrošinātu procesa saskaņotu norisi no paša sākuma.

name_translations.es: Identificar partes interesadas y recopilar preferencias
name_translations.it: Identificare le parti interessate e raccogliere preferenze
name_translations.lv: Identificējiet ieinteresētās puses un savāciet preferences

description_translations.en: Identify the participants and gather their initial preferences and constraints to build a coordinated approach to planning.
description_translations.es: Identifique a los participantes y recopile sus preferencias y limitaciones iniciales para construir un enfoque coordinado en la planificación.
description_translations.it: Identifica i partecipanti e raccogli le loro preferenze e vincoli iniziali per sviluppare un approccio coordinato alla pianificazione.
description_translations.lv: Identificējiet dalībniekus un savāciet viņu sākotnējās preferences un ierobežojumus, lai veidotu saskaņotu pieeju plānošanai.

name_translations.it: Identifica i partecipanti e assegna i ruoli

description_translations.en: Determine the necessary roles for the trip planning and assign participants accordingly.
description_translations.es: Determine los roles necesarios para la planificación del viaje y asigne a los participantes en consecuencia.
description_translations.it: Determina i ruoli necessari per la pianificazione del viaggio e assegna i partecipanti di conseguenza.
description_translations.lv: Nosakiet nepieciešamās lomas ceļojuma plānošanai un piešķiriet dalībniekus atbilstoši.

name_translations.en: Conduct an initial survey to understand preferences and budget constraints
name_translations.es: Realizar una encuesta inicial para entender preferencias y limitaciones presupuestarias
name_translations.it: Conduci un sondaggio iniziale per comprendere preferenze e vincoli di budget
name_translations.lv: Veiciet sākotnējo aptauju, lai izprastu preferences un budžeta ierobežojumus

description_translations.en: Collect initial preferences, budget constraints, and other relevant data from participants to guide the planning process.
description_translations.es: Recoja las preferencias iniciales, las limitaciones presupuestarias y otros datos relevantes de los participantes para guiar el proceso de planificación.
description_translations.it: Raccogli preferenze iniziali, vincoli di budget e altri dati rilevanti dai partecipanti per guidare il processo di pianificazione.
description_translations.lv: Savāciet sākotnējās preferences, budžeta ierobežojumus un citus atbilstošus datus no dalībniekiem, lai virzītu plānošanas procesu.

interlinkers.name: Doodle
interlinkers.description: Online tool for time management and coordinating meetings.

interlinkers.name: Stakeholder Engagement Plan for INTERLINK project
interlinkers.description: Document for designing stakeholder engagement strategies.

interlinkers.description: Tool for identifying and organizing stakeholders.
